sentence.Network_en: It is time to go beyond the shibboleth that conventional forces cannot deter.
sentence.Network_cn: 是时候摆脱那些传统力量无法遏制的陈规陋习了。

sentence.Network_en: They would say to him, Then say, Shibboleth.
Maritime nations still respond automatically to the shibboleth of the freedom of the seas.
sentence.Network_cn: 海洋国家依然听从[四海自由]的口令.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... servile adj 奴隶的奴性(态)的卑屈的 shibboleth n 口令 sinister adj 险恶的.
至于示播列（shibboleth），这个词的意义并不比，让我们说，它成为一个通行密令，一个归属标志，一种结姻宣示时的意指形式，更 …
kinship的翻译... ... tolerant 宽容的, 容忍的, (对冷、热)能... shibboleth 暗语, 暗号, 口令, 口号, 行... pustule 脓疱.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... wrath 愤怒，大怒 shibboleth 陈旧语句，习俗 wraith 幽灵，骨瘦如柴的人.

list.abs: elderly politicians still clinging to the outmoded shibboleths of party doctrine ., 仍然抱着党性教条的陈词滥调不放的年迈的政治家.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 17th cent.: from Hebrew šibbōleṯ 'ear of corn', used as a test of nationality by its difficult pronunciation (Judg. 12:6)

entry.tran: 过时的观点;陈旧的原则;错误的信念
entry.def: If you describe an idea or belief as a shibboleth, you mean that it is thought important by a group of people but may be old-fashioned or wrong.

example.ex: It is time to go beyond the shibboleth that conventional forces cannot deter.
example.tran: 是时候摆脱那些传统力量无法遏制的陈规陋习了。

means.word_mean: 1. a favorite saying of a sect or political group
2. a manner of speaking that is distinctive of a particular group of people

auth_sentence.content: "Follow the money," the old muckraker's shibboleth has it.
auth_sentence.res_content: "Follow the money," the old muckraker's shibboleth has it.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Follow the money," the old muckraker's shibboleth has it.

auth_sentence.content: Then said they vnto him, Say now, Shibboleth: and he said Sibboleth.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then said they vnto him, Say now, Shibboleth: and he said Sibboleth.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then said they vnto him, Say now, Shibboleth: and he said Sibboleth.

auth_sentence.content: But he won't touch the shibboleth of Japan's political establishment the postal service.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he won't touch the shibboleth of Japan's political establishment the postal service.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he won't touch the shibboleth of Japan's political establishment the postal service.
